## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_021960]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Male and female sterile.  Defects in meiosis beginning in metaphase I.  Hypersensitivity to a crosslinking reagent, cisplatin, and to gamma-irradiation.  Somatic homologous recombination is reduced twofold below wild-type frequency.
   - [atradc-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Homozygotes are sterile. Pollen is not viable and female gametophyte development is blocked after meiosis.
